trans-unit.source: Represents an access control list (ACL) and is the base class for the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl" /> and <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma ACL (lista de controle de acesso) e é a classe base para as classes <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.DiscretionaryAcl" /> e <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.SystemAcl" />.

trans-unit.source: Certain combinations of inheritance and access mask flags are meaningless:
trans-unit.target: Algumas combinações de herança e sinalizadores de máscara de acesso são sem sentido:

trans-unit.source: Any access control entry (ACE) with a zero-access mask is removed.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer entrada de controle de acesso (ACE) com uma máscara de acesso de zero é removida.

trans-unit.source: Inherit-only ACEs inside object ACLs are removed.
trans-unit.target: ACEs herdar somente dentro de ACLs de objeto são removidas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.InheritOnly>, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.NoPropagateInherit>, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit>, and <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> flags on all ACEs in leaf object ACLs are cleared.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.InheritOnly>, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.NoPropagateInherit>, <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit>, e <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> sinalizadores em todas as ACEs na folha do objeto ACLs são desmarcadas.

trans-unit.source: ACEs that have an <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.InheritOnly> flag in the absence of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> flag are meaningless; they are removed.
trans-unit.target: ACEs que têm um <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.InheritOnly> sinalizador na ausência do <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit> ou <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> sinalizador não fazem sentido; eles são removidos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.NoPropagateInherit> flag in the absence of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> flag can be removed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.PropagationFlags.NoPropagateInherit> sinalizador na ausência de <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ContainerInherit> ou <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.InheritanceFlags.ObjectInherit> sinalizador pode ser removido.

trans-unit.source: ACEs that have an <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> value of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Success> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Failure> in discretionary access control lists (DACLs) are removed.
trans-unit.target: ACEs que têm um <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> valor <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Success> ou <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Failure> no controle de acesso discricionário (DACLs) da lista é removida.

trans-unit.source: Any audit ACE that does not specify either <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Success> or <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Failure> is removed.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer auditoria ACE que não especifica nem <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Success> ou <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags.Failure> é removido.

trans-unit.source: On DACLs, SystemAudit and SystemAlarm ACEs are removed.
trans-unit.target: Em DACLs, SystemAudit e SystemAlarm ACEs são removidas.

trans-unit.source: On system access control lists (SACLs), AccessAllowed and AccessDenied ACEs are removed.
trans-unit.target: Nas listas de controle de acesso do sistema (SACL), AccessAllowed e AccessDenied ACEs são removidas.

trans-unit.source: Canonical order is maintained according to the following algorithm:
trans-unit.target: Ordem canônica é mantida de acordo com o seguinte algoritmo:

trans-unit.source: Explicit ACEs take precedence over inherited ACEs; this rule applies to both DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: ACEs explícitas têm prioridade sobre as ACEs herdadas; Essa regra se aplica a DACLs e SACLs.

trans-unit.source: In DACLs, among the explicit ACEs, ACEs that deny access take precedence over ACEs that allow access.
trans-unit.target: Em DACLs entre as ACEs explícitas, ACEs que negam acesso prevalecerão sobre ACEs que permitam o acesso.

trans-unit.source: For directory object ACLs, the nonobject ACEs come before object ACEs.
trans-unit.target: Para o objeto de diretório ACLs, as ACEs nonobject vêm antes de ACEs de objeto.

trans-unit.source: All common ACEs take precedence over noncommon ACEs.
trans-unit.target: Todas as ACEs comuns têm precedência sobre as ACEs noncommon.

trans-unit.source: Inherited ACEs maintain their relative order after canonicity.
trans-unit.target: ACEs herdadas mantêm sua ordem relativa após canonicity.

trans-unit.source: Unrecognized and custom ACEs are disallowed in both DACLs and SACLs.
trans-unit.target: ACEs não reconhecidas e personalizadas não são permitidas em DACLs e SACLs.

trans-unit.source: Within contiguous ranges (explicit AccessDenied and AccessAllowed ACEs on DACLs, all explicit ACEs on SACLs), the ACEs are sorted by using the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objects associated with the ACEs.
trans-unit.target: Dentro dos intervalos contíguos (AccessDenied explícita e ACEs AccessAllowed em DACLs, todas as ACEs explícitas em SACLs), as ACEs são classificadas usando o <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo%2A> métodos do <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> objetos associados com as ACEs.

trans-unit.source: Adjacent ACEs are combined, if appropriate.
trans-unit.target: ACEs adjacentes são combinadas, se apropriado.

trans-unit.source: This reduces the size of the ACL without affecting the access control semantics it grants.
trans-unit.target: Isso reduz o tamanho da ACL sem afetar a semântica de controle de acesso que ele concede.

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o comprimento, em bytes, da representação binária do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: This length should be used before marshaling the access control list (ACL) into a binary array by using the <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse comprimento deve ser usado antes de se realizar o marshaling da ACL (lista de controle de acesso) em uma matriz binária usando o método <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" />.

trans-unit.source: The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O comprimento, em bytes, da representação binária da atual <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of access control entries (ACEs) in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de ACEs (Entradas do Controle de Acesso) no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The number of ACEs in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de ACEs atual <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The byte array into which the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> is marshaled.
trans-unit.target: A matriz de bytes na qual o marshaling do conteúdo do <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> é realizado.

trans-unit.source: The offset at which to start marshaling.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento no qual iniciar o marshaling.

trans-unit.source: Marshals the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: Realiza o marshalling do conteúdo do objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> para a matriz de bytes especificada começando no deslocamento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether the access control entries (ACEs) in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object are in canonical order.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor booliano que especifica se as ACEs (entradas de controle de acesso) no objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> atual estão na ordem canônica.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ACEs in the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object are in canonical order; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se as ACEs atual <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> objeto estão na ordem canônica; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object is a container.
trans-unit.target: Define se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> é um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object is a container.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> objeto é um contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Sets whether the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object is a directory object access control list (ACL).
trans-unit.target: Define se o objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> atual é uma ACL (lista de controle de acesso) do objeto de diretório.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object is a directory object ACL.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o atual <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> é um objeto ACL do diretório.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero do <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> a ser obtido ou definido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAce" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object to check for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> a ser verificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all access control entries (ACEs) contained by this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object that are associated with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as ACEs (entradas de controle de acesso) contidas por esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> que estão associadas ao objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all inherited access control entries (ACEs) from this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as ACEs (entradas de controle de acesso) herdadas deste objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nível de revisão do <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />.

trans-unit.source: A byte value that specifies the revision level of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de byte que especifica o nível de revisão de <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonAcl" />.
